snippet: Victor Oladipo of Indiana will leave college to join the N.B.A. Oladipo, a junior first-team all-American, was the Hoosiers’ second-leading scorer and is projected as a top-six choice.
abstract: Indiana shooting guard Victor Oladipo, junior first-team all-American, will leave college to join the NBA draft.
lead_paragraph: Victor Oladipo of Indiana will leave college to join the N.B.A. Oladipo, a junior first-team all-American, was the Hoosiers’ second-leading scorer and is projected as a top-six choice.

headline.seo: Victor Oladipo of Indiana to Enter N.B.A. Draft
